member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor
member.summary: Provides the base class for an AST node visitor.

remarks.para: This class supports the visitor pattern.
Each visitor implements a OnVisiting and an OnVisited method for each AST node type. By default the OnVisiting method returns true, while the OnVisited method does nothing.

The OnVisiting method should return true if its child nodes should be visited. If true is returned, the child nodes are visiting in order. After the child nodes are visited, the OnVisited method is called. If OnVisiting returns false, child node visits are not made and OnVisited is called directly.
Additionally, the generic method is called before any type-specific OnVisiting method is executed and the generic method is called after any type-specific OnVisited method is executed.

member.summary: Visits the after the type-specific OnVisited method is executed.

member.returns: true if the node and its children should be visited; otherwise, false.
